descriptions.mainCopy:
Kyuppiriin!
Good morning, good afternoon and good evening!
I'm Enomiya Milk, a virtual idol trainee from NoriPro!
descriptions.subDescription: Virtual idol trainee. She is an energetic girl who loves games more than anything else, but also loves to eat. She loves her brother Inuyama Tamaki, and her mom, Tsukudani Norio. And - she's a little yandereish.
